Package com.csse3200.game.components.hero.samurai.attacks

Class SpinAttackComponent

java.lang.Object
com.csse3200.game.components.Component
com.csse3200.game.components.hero.samurai.attacks.AbstractSwordAttackComponent
com.csse3200.game.components.hero.samurai.attacks.SpinAttackComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISamuraiAttack
public class SpinAttackComponent extends AbstractSwordAttackComponent
Spinning sword attack that emits multiple Sword Qi projectiles in batches while the hero rotates.

Key behaviors:

  • Gated by global cooldown + a small per-skill debounce (mini cooldown) + a simple attack lock.
  • Rotates the sword pose over duration, optionally multiple full turns (turns).
  • Emits qiSpinCount projectiles spaced evenly by angle, batched over time via emitInterval.
  • Auto-extends duration if needed to finish all batched emissions.
